alert.note: Alert for Geneva (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 9:26PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Geneva, Walton, Holmes and central Washington Counties through 1000 PM CDT... At 926 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lockhart to 7 miles north of De Funiak Springs to near Bonifay. Movement was south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Vernon, De Funiak Springs, Bonifay, Geneva, Samson, Eglin Air Force Base, Union, Liberty, Live Oak, Freeport, Paxton, Ponce De Leon, Caryville, Wausau, Westville, Black, Oakwood Hills, Cluster Springs, Kellys Crossroads and Whitehead Crossroads. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
